scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:setup && npm run build:openrpc && npm run dist:docs && npm run dist:d && npm run dist:sdk
scripts.validate: firebolt-openrpc --task validate --source ./src --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas/ && npm run build:openrpc && firebolt-openrpc --task validate --source ./dist/firebolt-manage-open-rpc.json --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas/
scripts.dist:sdk: npm run validate && npm run build:sdk && cp -R ./build/sdk/javascript/src/* ./dist/lib/ && npm run test
scripts.dist:docs: npm run validate && npm run build:docs asPath && rm -r ./dist/docs && cp -R ./build/docs/markdown ./dist/docs
scripts.dist:wiki: npm run validate && npm run build:wiki && rm -r ./dist/docs && cp -R ./build/docs/markdown ./dist/docs
scripts.test:setup: rimraf test/transpiled-suite && npx tsc --target es6 --moduleResolution node --outDir test/transpiled-suite/
scripts.clean: rimraf build && npx mkdirp build && rimraf dist && npx mkdirp dist
scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run build:docs && npm run build:sdk
scripts.publish:word: npx mkdirp ./dist/word/schemas && cd ./dist/docs && find . -iname "*.md" -type f -exec sh -c 'pandoc "${0}" -o "../word/${0%.md}.docx"' {} \;
